analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: therefore the bodhisattva, the great hero, having understood that form is empty of essence,

analyzed: zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: fully and completely awakens to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: gal te tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni /

original: byang chub sems dpa' @171b sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /

translated: and also the bodhisattva great being would not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na /🔽de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na / de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, it is because feeling is empty of a basic nature,

original: zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: therefore the bodhisattva great being, having understood that ‘feeling is empty of a basic nature,’ fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gal te 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni /
translated: If perception were not empty of a basic nature,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: then also the bodhisattva great being would not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pas na /
translated: Subhūti, it is because perception is empty of a basic nature,

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Therefore, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should know that perception is empty of the nature of perception.🔽

original: zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings, having understood that perception is empty of a basic nature, fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gal te 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni /
translated: If formations were not empty of a basic nature,

analyzed: zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na med pa yang @172a *//

analyzed: gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni /
translated: If unconditioned emptiness were not empty of a basic nature,

analyzed: 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // tshad med pa rnams stong pa'am /

analyzed: 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa'am / 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa'am /

analyzed: 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa'am /

analyzed: 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa'am /

analyzed: 'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

analyzed: 'di ni / chos so //

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature🔽does not disturb eye consciousness, thinking,

analyzed: 'di ni / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni / 'di ni / sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of a basic nature🔽is not the emptiness of the ear consciousness.🔽He does not disturb nose consciousness, saying, ‘This is nose consciousness.

analyzed: 'di ni / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni / 'di ni / lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of a basic nature🔽is not the emptiness of the nose consciousness.🔽He does not disturb tongue consciousness, saying, ‘This is tongue consciousness.

analyzed: 'di ni / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: This is the emptiness of tongue consciousness.

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid @199b ni; 'di ni /
translated: The emptiness of a basic nature🔽is not the emptiness of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: It is the body consciousness.🔽This is the emptiness of the body consciousness.🔽The emptiness of an intrinsic nature is not the body consciousness.🔽It is the mind consciousness.🔽This is the emptiness of the mind consciousness.

original: 'di ni / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'di ni / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /

analyzed: 'di ni; yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ni / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of an intrinsic nature is not the ear constituent.🔽It is the sound constituent.🔽This is the emptiness of the sound constituent.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /

original: 'di ni / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ni / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /

original: 'di ni / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ni / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of an intrinsic nature is not the body constituent.🔽It is the tangible-object constituent.🔽This is the emptiness of the tangible-object constituent.🔽The emptiness of an intrinsic nature is not the tangible-object constituent.🔽It is

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni / 'di ni / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o; ;'di ni /
translated: The emptiness of the intrinsic nature🔽is not the nose sense-sphere,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

analyzed: 'du shes kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //

original: 'du byed kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Conditioning does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb conditioning.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb conditioned phenomena.🔽Consciousness does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽mig kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // mig kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb consciousness.🔽The eyes do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rna ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rna ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the eyes.🔽The ears do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽sna'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // sna'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the ears.🔽The nose does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽lce'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang lce @206a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // lce'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang lce @206a *//
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the nose.🔽The tongue does not disturb emptiness.

original: rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the tongue.

original: lus kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: lus kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The body does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽yid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // yid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb the body.🔽The mind does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽gzugs kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // gzugs kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the mind.🔽Form does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽sgra'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // sgra'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb form.🔽Sound does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sgra rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽dri'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sgra rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // dri'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb sound.🔽Smell does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dri rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽ro'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dri rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // ro'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb smell.🔽Taste does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ro rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ro rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb taste.

original: reg kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: reg kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Tactile objects do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang reg rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽chos kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang reg rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // chos kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb contact.🔽A phenomenon does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb a phenomenon.🔽Eye consciousness does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb eye consciousness.🔽Ear consciousness does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽@206b stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / @206b stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb ear consciousness.🔽Nose consciousness does not disturb emptiness.🔽Emptiness does not disturb nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Tongue consciousness does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb the tongue consciousness.🔽The body consciousness does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the body consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam pa 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam pa 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The mind consciousness does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the mind consciousness.🔽The sensory domain of the eye does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory domain of the eye.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par la 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par la 'khrug par mi byed do // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The sensory domain of the ear does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory domain of the ear.🔽The sensory domain of the nose does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory domain of the nose.🔽The sensory domain of the tongue does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory domain of the tongue.🔽The sensory domain of the body does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory domain of the body.🔽The sensory domain of thought does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory domain of thought.🔽The sensory element of the eye does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of the eye.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The sensory element of the ear does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of the ear.🔽The sensory element of the nose does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of the nose.🔽The sensory element of the tongue does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of the tongue.🔽The sensory element of the body does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of the body.🔽The sensory element of thought does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of thought.🔽The sensory element of visual consciousness does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of visual consciousness.🔽The sensory element of auditory consciousness does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of auditory consciousness.🔽The sensory element of olfactory consciousness does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of olfactory consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: The sensory element of gustatory consciousness does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of gustatory consciousness.🔽The sensory element of tactile consciousness does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of tactile consciousness.🔽The sensory element of thought consciousness does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the sensory element of thought consciousness.🔽The sensory element of visual experience does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of the nose sense-sphere does not disturb the nose sense-sphere, and the nose sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of the tongue sense-sphere does not disturb the tongue sense-sphere, and the tongue sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of the body sense-sphere does not disturb the body sense-sphere, and the body sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of the thinking-mind sense-sphere does not disturb the thinking-mind sense-sphere, and the thinking-mind sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the form sense-sphere does not disturb the form sense-sphere, and the form sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the sound sense-sphere does not disturb the sound sense-sphere, and the sound sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the smell sense-sphere does not disturb the smell sense-sphere, and the smell sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the taste sense-sphere does not disturb the taste sense-sphere, and the taste sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the tangible sense-sphere does not disturb the tangible sense-sphere, and the tangible sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong @207a *// pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong @207a *// pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of the thinking-mind objects sense-sphere does not disturb the thinking-mind objects sense-sphere, and the thinking-mind objects sense-sphere does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the eye consciousness does not disturb the eye consciousness, and the eye consciousness does not disturb emptiness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of the ear consciousness does not disturb the ear consciousness, and the ear consciousness does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the nose consciousness does not disturb the nose consciousness, and the nose consciousness does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the tongue consciousness does not disturb the tongue consciousness, and the tongue consciousness does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the body consciousness does not disturb the body consciousness, and the body consciousness does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the thinking-mind consciousness does not disturb the thinking-mind consciousness, and the thinking-mind consciousness does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the eye contact does not disturb the eye contact, and the eye contact does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: emptiness does not disturb the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed; stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed; stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of body contact does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The feeling that arises from the sensory contact of the body is not something that disturbs emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness is not something that disturbs the feeling that arises from the sensory contact of the body.🔽The feeling that arises from the sensory contact of the mind is not something that disturbs emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽sa'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug @207b par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // sa'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug @207b par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness is not something that disturbs the feeling that arises from the sensory contact of the mind.🔽The earth element is not something that disturbs emptiness.🔽Emptiness is not something that disturbs the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The water element is not something that disturbs emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do; ;me'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do; ;me'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The fire element does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rlung gi khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rlung gi khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the fire element.🔽The wind element does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The space element does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the space element.🔽The consciousness element does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: ma rig pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Ignorance does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb ignorance.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽'du byed kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // 'du byed kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb ignorance.🔽Formations do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb formations.🔽Consciousness does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽ming dang gzugs kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // ming dang gzugs kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb consciousness.🔽Name and form do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽skye mched drug kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa @208a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // skye mched drug kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa @208a *//
translated: Emptiness does not disturb name and form.🔽The six sense spheres do not disturb emptiness.

original: nyid kyang skye mched drug rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: nyid kyang skye mched drug rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: reg pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Contact does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do; ;tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang reg pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do; ;tshor ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Feeling does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽sred pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // sred pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb feeling.🔽Craving does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang sred pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽len pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sred pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // len pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb craving.🔽Clinging does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang len pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽srid pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang len pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // srid pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb clinging.🔽Becoming does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb becoming.

original: stong pa nyid kyang srid pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽skya ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang srid pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // skya ba'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Birth does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang skye ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang skye ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: and emptiness does not disturb birth.🔽Aging and death do not disturb emptiness,

original: rga shi'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: rga shi'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb aging and death.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rgo shi rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rgo shi rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb the perfection of giving.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: The perfection of giving does not disturb emptiness.🔽The perfection of morality does not disturb emptiness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed; stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed; stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the perfection of morality.🔽The perfection of patience does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid @208b kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid @208b kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The perfection of vigor does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb the perfection of perseverance.🔽The perfection of concentration does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the perfection of concentration.🔽The perfection of wisdom does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the perfection of wisdom.🔽Inner emptiness does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed; stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed; stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness of external phenomena does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness of external and internal phenomena does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness of emptiness does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: emptiness of great extent does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug @209a *//🔽par mi byed /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug @209a *//🔽par mi byed /
translated: emptiness of ultimate reality does not disturb emptiness, and emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: emptiness does not disturb emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness of the conditioned does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb emptiness of the conditioned.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: emptiness of the unconditioned does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽emptiness of what is beyond extremes does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness of what is unlimited does not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb emptiness of what is unlimited.

original: stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of the beginningless and endless does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of nonrejection does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of nonrejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of nature does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par @209b 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par @209b 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of its own mark does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature does not disturb emptiness.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-things does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of non-things.🔽The emptiness of essential nature does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽The applications of mindfulness do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the applications of mindfulness.🔽The right efforts do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the right efforts.🔽The legs of miraculous power do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽dbang po rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // dbang po rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the legs of miraculous power.🔽The faculties do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dbang @210a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dbang @210a *//
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the faculties.

original: po rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: po rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: the powers do not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the powers.🔽The limbs of awakening do not disturb emptiness,🔽and emptiness does not disturb the limbs of awakening.

original: stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The noble eightfold path does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the noble eightfold path.🔽The noble truths do not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The concentrations do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽tshad med pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // tshad med pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the concentrations.🔽The immeasurables do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the immeasurables.🔽The formless absorptions do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang stong pa nyid rnam par @210b 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang stong pa nyid rnam par @210b 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the formless absorptions.🔽The eight deliverances do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The nine serial absorptions do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the nine serial absorptions.🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.🔽The clairvoyances do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: The meditative stabilizations do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb the meditative stabilizations,🔽the dhāraṇī gateways do not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The ten powers of the tathāgatas do not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /🔽stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs @211a *//
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed / stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs @211a *//
translated: The four fearlessnesses do not disturb emptiness,

original: pa bzhi rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: pa bzhi rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the four fearlessnesses.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges do not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Great love does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽snying rje chen po'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // snying rje chen po'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb great love.🔽Great compassion does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb great compassion.🔽The eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha do not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha.🔽The result of stream enterer does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: Emptiness does not disturb the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: the result of being tied to one more rebirth does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the result of being tied to one more rebirth.🔽the result of no longer being subject to rebirth does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug @211b par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // dgra bcom pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug @211b par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the result of no longer being subject to rebirth.🔽the state of a worthy one does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽rang byang chub kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // rang byang chub kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the state of a worthy one.🔽solitary awakening does not disturb emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang rang byang chub rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rang byang chub rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: and emptiness does not disturb solitary awakening.🔽the knowledge of path aspects does not disturb emptiness,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: and emptiness does not disturb the knowledge of path aspects.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: emptiness does not disturb the knowledge of the aspects of the path.🔽unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening does not disturb emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do //
translated: emptiness does not disturb unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.
